modules.name: TheBifurcator
modules.description: Generate CV/GATE/TRIGGER outputs based on bifurcation maps of iterated functions

modules.name: Tesseract
modules.description: Generate CV output sequences using vertex positions of a rotating tesseract projected on a 2D space

modules.name: Ikeda
modules.description: Generate CV output sequences with positions of chaotic attractors in the Ikeda map
